abstract: The Justice Department is asking about the company’s ties to a former Army surgeon whose report on a bone growth product is now disputed.
snippet: The Justice Department is asking about the company’s ties to a former Army surgeon whose report on a bone growth product is now disputed.
lead_paragraph: Medtronic disclosed on Tuesday that it had received a Justice Department subpoena seeking information about its ties with a company consultant, a former Army doctor accused of falsifying a favorable medical journal article about a Medtronic bone growth product called Infuse.

headline.main: Medtronic Gets Subpoena Regarding Disputed Study
headline.print_headline: Medtronic Gets Subpoena Regarding Disputed Study

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
